ComicInfo.Title: Mr. Monster's Hi-Shock Schlock; The Flat Man; and the Mummies; Corpses...Coast to Coast!; Mr. Monster's High Shock Shlock
ComicInfo.Summary: After a modern intro with Mr. Monster by Michael T. Gilbert the comic is made up of three stories from 50s horror comics. The Thin Man from Journey into Fear # 19 A man who is run over by a steam roller and yet still lives, but is turned into a human as thin as paper, he plots to turn a woman he wants into a thin woman. Writer & Artist unknown Frankenstein and the Mummies from Frankenstein # 3 The comedy version of the Monster from the 40s Corpses . . . Coast to Coast! from Voodoo # 14 A fiend rases zombies... Commie zombies! Writer & Artish unknown Ends with two pages by Hembeck.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-02 23:36:00. [CVDB224653] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 20:11:17. [Issue ID 42604]
